name: BUY OHIO PPE MANUFACTURER'S NETWORK
description: Advocacy for Ohio and US made PPE
sampleDescriptions: Working with an expanded network of PPE manufacturer's in the United States to ensure that the federal government procures safe and effective PPE from American made companies.
